title: The 'RatnaJyothi' Ruby and Emerald Haaram: A Legacy of South Indian Splendor
materials: G Color). Features a rich Hyderabadi Polish for enduring luster.
features: This stunning Haaram features a graduating design with meticulously bezel-set oval Burmese rubies, each surrounded by a halo of sparkling diamonds. The focal point is a large, intricately carved Zambian emerald, also framed by diamonds, creating a captivating centerpiece. The emerald's carving features delicate floral motifs, showcasing exquisite craftsmanship. The necklace is connected with diamond-studded connectors, adding to its brilliance and flexibility.
occasions: Perfect for grand occasions like weddings (Vivaha)
or any event where you want to make a statement of timeless elegance. Also suitable for contemporary high-profile events.
description: A true heirloom piece, this Haaram embodies South Indian artistry with a modern sensibility. The combination of vibrant rubies, a unique carved emerald, and dazzling diamonds creates a breathtaking effect. The Hyderabadi polish ensures long-lasting shine. This piece is not just jewelry; it's an investment in cultural heritage and timeless beauty.
